resources.string: Vaccination is the administration of a vaccine to help the immune system develop protection from ....
Since the emergence of this novel coronavirus in December 2019, more than 20 vaccines have started to be rolled out. Here is an at-a-glance overview of those vaccines
This App offers states for Corona Virus Vaccine around the world

The Application Was Develop By:
1- Ahmed Yusef
2-Ali Khalifa
3-Akram Talib
4-Asawer Dawood
5-Mohamed Ali
6-Nooralden

Vaccination is a simple, safe, and effective way of protecting people against harmful diseases, before they come into contact with them. It uses your body’s natural defenses to build resistance to specific infections and makes your immune system stronger. Vaccines train your immune system to create antibodies, just as it does when it’s exposed to a disease.
